featureConvert module¶

This module contains functions that convert a grid list into a 2-D numpy array. The grid list contains all instances of the current game. The player location is always fixed on the center of the matrix by appendeding zeros that shift automatically in accordance with the player movment. This was a technical choice made to reduce the time complexity.

Project : Bomberman Bot with Machine Learning Olin College Software Design Final Orject, Spring 2017 By : TEAM AFK

featureConvert.convertGrid(grid, pPos, viewX, viewY)[source]¶

Converts a 2d grid list into a numpy array, appended with zeros so that the player is always located at its center.

featureConvert.printGrid(mymat)[source]¶

Prints the 5x5 matrix with the player located at the center. Serves as a testing code to see if the feature extraction is working.
